      • setI18nKey

        public static void setI18nKey(@Nonnull
                              javafx.scene.control.Labeled node,
                              @Nonnull
                              java.lang.String key)
        Associates an i18n key to a node. The key is used to resolve a message via the application's MessageSource.
        Parameters:
        node - the target node on which the key will be registered.
        key - the message key to be registered.
        Since:
        2.9.0

      • getI18nKey

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String getI18nKey(@Nonnull
                                                    javafx.scene.control.Labeled node)
        Finds out if an i18n key has been registered with the target Node, returning the key if found.
        Parameters:
        node - the target node on which the key may have been registered.
        Returns:
        the key registered with the target Node or null if not found.
        Since:
        2.9.0

      • createJavaFXThreadProxyList

        @Deprecated
 @Nonnull
public static <E> javafx.collections.ObservableList<E> createJavaFXThreadProxyList(@Nonnull
                                                                                                         javafx.collections.ObservableList<E> source)
        Deprecated. Use GriffonFXCollections.uiThreadAwareObservableList instead.
        Wraps an ObservableList, publishing updates inside the UI thread.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the list's parameter type.
        Parameters:
        source - the ObservableList to be wrapped
        Returns:
        a new ObservableList
        Since:
        2.6.0
        See Also:
        GriffonFXCollections.uiThreadAwareObservableList(javafx.collections.ObservableList<E>)

      • createJavaFXThreadProxySet

        @Deprecated
 @Nonnull
public static <E> javafx.collections.ObservableSet<E> createJavaFXThreadProxySet(@Nonnull
                                                                                                       javafx.collections.ObservableSet<E> source)
        Deprecated. Use GriffonFXCollections.uiThreadAwareObservableSet instead.
        Wraps an ObservableSet, publishing updates inside the UI thread.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the set's parameter type.
        Parameters:
        source - the ObservableSet to be wrapped
        Returns:
        a new ObservableSet
        Since:
        2.9.0
        See Also:
        GriffonFXCollections.uiThreadAwareObservableSet(javafx.collections.ObservableSet<E>)

      • createJavaFXThreadProxyMap

        @Deprecated
 @Nonnull
public static <K,V> javafx.collections.ObservableMap<K,V> createJavaFXThreadProxyMap(@Nonnull
                                                                                                           javafx.collections.ObservableMap<K,V> source)
        Deprecated. Use GriffonFXCollections.uiThreadAwareObservableMap instead.
        Wraps an ObservableMap, publishing updates inside the UI thread.
        Type Parameters:
        K - the type of keys maintained by the map
        V - the type of mapped values
        Parameters:
        source - the ObservableMap to be wrapped
        Returns:
        a new ObservableMap
        Since:
        2.9.0
        See Also:
        GriffonFXCollections.uiThreadAwareObservableMap(javafx.collections.ObservableMap<K, V>)
